summary: Adds Dark Legion\'s Edge - sword from Lineage II game.
descriptionHtml:
==============================================
                  Dark Legion\'s Edge
==============================================

1. About
This mod adds the sword from Lineage II. It is enchantable and improvable.
You can craft it in any forge (ebony smithing perk needed). Also you can buy it in Eorlund Gray-Mane. 
Sword has the same stats as ebony sword, but increased critical rate. 
2H version added in v1.2. 

All meshes and textures are mine. None data was imported from other games.

2. Installation: 
Simply extract DLE.bsa and DLE_en.esp to skyrim/data folder and make sure that \"DLE_en.esp\" is checked in the Data files. Nothing special.

3. Uninstallation:
Delete DLE.bsa and DLE_en.esp from \"Data\" folder. 

4. Author: DeadMaroz

5.Credits:
Petrovich - for some help with Nifskope and testing
Bethesda - for the game
NCsoft - for the sword design
